Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I did it. Want to give it a try, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia hands you a bag of freshly popped popcorn.'}
{3: "The taste of black pepper spreads throughout your mouth, complementing the aroma of popcorn. Although it's different from the traditionally sweet taste, you still find it delicious."}
{3: 'After getting your approval, Lucia starts to try other flavor combinations.'}
{3: 'Rather than mixing a large number of seasonings into the machine, she gradually mixes the flavors to taste.'}
{3: 'Even then, some of the combinations are less than ideal...'}
{3: 'This time the popcorn has the sour tang of tomato.'}
{3: "This time it's chocolate. Compared with just adding sugar, the addition of cocoa butter gives it a rich aroma."}
{3: 'Lucia stops making popcorn after confirming that she has enough, despite leaving several seasonings and flavor combinations untouched.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'On the way back, you watch Lucia munching on the only bag of spicy popcorn and ask her a question that had been on your mind.'}
{2: 'Why are you so persistent about cooking?', 3: '38'}
{3: 'The more people know themselves, the more difficult it is to tolerate their own insurmountable defects, especially in the eyes of others.'}
{3: 'The reason why Lucia chose to make popcorn was that it would show her dedication to overcoming her greatest weakness.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "But I'm very happy you like my popcorn, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yes. I've had a lot of people help me between missions.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Karenina is always looking for a showdown with Lucia. It's hard to imagine her teaching Lucia to cook."}
{3: 'Now that the festivities are starting to quiet down, you start to see the venue clear out.'}
{3: 'You stuff another handful of popcorn in your mouth, releasing the subtle bitter-sweet flavor of chocolate.'}
{3: 'Watching Lucia continue to eat her spicy popcorn, you make up your mind.'}
{2: 'How about we cook together next time?'}
{3: 'As the night comes to an end, the two of you make plans for the future.'}
